text: Large amounts of meat consumption are harming the environment, but people are part of the environment and despite assertions to the contrary it is a natural part of our biological makeup to consume meat and has been for tens of thousands of years.
label: People will or should still eat meat

text: Large amounts of meat consumption are harming the environment, but meat exports are occurring which stabilize and provide jobs for Americans.
label: Meat creates jobs and benefits economy

text: Large amounts of meat consumption are harming the environment, but to avoid over animal population eating meat is necessary.
label: Outside of article's scope

text: Large amounts of meat consumption are harming the environment, but it's a booming industry that employs millions.
label: Meat creates jobs and benefits economy
